alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 445 PM CDT/345 PM MDT/... At 421 PM CDT/321 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kilgore, or 18 miles west of Valentine, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kilgore and Crookston. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 171 and 189. Highway 83 between mile markers 218 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
